FrageText.de: Der Mopedlenker kommt Ihnen entgegen. Wie verhalten Sie sich?
FrageText.en: The moped driver is coming towards you. How do you conduct yourself?
FrageText.hr: Vozač mopeda Vam dolazi u susret. Kako postupate?
FrageText.sl: Voznik mopeda vam vozi nasproti. Kako se vedete?
FrageText.tr: Mopedli size doğru yaklaşıyor. Nasıl davranırsınız?

de.Text: Ich halte an und warte, bis der Mopedfahrer vorbei ist
Ich gebe Lichtzeichen, hupe und fahre weiter
Ich weiche nach rechts in die Wiese aus

en.Text: I come to a stop and wait until the moped has driven past
I signal with my lights, honk, and drive on
I move out of the way by moving over to the left
I move out of the way by making a right into the meadow

hr.Text: Zaustavim se i sačekam dok vozač mopeda ne prođe
Dam svjetlosni znak upozorenja, zvučni znak upozorenja i nastavim voziti

sl.Text: Ustavim in počakam, da voznik mopeda odpelje mimo
Dam svetlobni znak, hupam in peljem dalje
Umaknem se na desno na travnik

tr.Text: Dururum ve mopedli geçene kadar beklerim
Selektör yapar, korna çalar ve devam ederim
